channel.title: Npcs don't attack when using mage

Hey guys,
I'm using a Devolution 7.0 server source and i'm currently wondering why when i use normal magic on an npc it doesn't fight back. It's only when i autocast it fights back.
All help is appreciated
Thanx! :)
